creator: thijs@debian.org
text:
Created attachment 30746
Fix balancer-manager HTML

The balancer-manager web interface contains a number of invalid HTML constructs. Attached patch fixes that up. It also adds <label> tags around radio button labels so the labels can be clicked in addition to just the radio button themselves.
It would be great to have possibility to add external CSS to this page.
creator: emdepl@gmail.com
